en-US.description: MAB logical reasoning section primarily assesses the candidate's ability to understand, analyze, judge, and synthesize various pieces of information, as well as their logical thinking skills in reasoning, argumentation, comparison, and evaluation.

MAB Writing reasoning section primarily assesses candidates' ability to construct clear, coherent, and persuasive arguments, demonstrating effective communication skills and critical thinking in addressing complex business scenarios.
